body:
## Who am I?
I'm a student and chocolate lab owner from Seattle, studying in Oregon, looking to get a foot in the big tech start-up world. I have been a geek my entire life and actually began college studying to become an Astronautical Engineer. That is when I began working with a few start-ups and learned a lot from great developers. I found this to be the perfect career for the skills I have. After gaining some experience, I am now ready to start my journey in this technology driven world which I have become so passionate about. I am currently working as a software development engineer intern at a tech start-up in Seattle, but am always looking for new projects to work on! Contact me!

## My Work
### ... so far
**Education:**
* _University Of Oregon_
* B.S. Computer Science with Mathematics minor

**Experience:**
* _Tenacity Sports_
* Software Development Engineer Intern
* June 2012 - Current

* _WODTime.com_
* Co-Founder
* September, 2011 – April, 2012

* _Freelance Web Developer_
* June, 2010 – Current

## Things I know
### ... and things I wish I knew better
* Java
* HTML & CSS
* JavaScript & jQuery
* CoffeeScript
* Ruby on Rails
* C++
* Python
* PHP
* SQL

## Favorite quotes
### ... and words to live by
"Money may not buy happiness, but I'd rather cry in a Jaguar than on a bus."
~Francoise Sagan

"It's fine to celebrate success but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure."
~Bill Gates

"A man is but the product of his thoughts; what he thinks, he becomes."
~Mahatma Gandhi

"Simplicity is prerequisite for reliability."
~Edsger W. Dijkstra

## Contact Me
info@sahildiwan.com
                   
## Random Rant
Using my knowledge, experience, network and drive, I hope to use what I've learned over the years to develop meaningful software which will make a difference in people’s lives.
tagline: First say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do.  ~Epictetus
name: Sahil Diwan
